text: Uss ney tum sab ko aik hi jaan say peda kiya hai phir ussi say uss ka jora peda kiya aur tumharay liye chopayon mein say (aath nar-o-madah)utaray woh tumhen tumhari maaon kay peton mein aik banawat kay baad doosri banawat per banata hai teen teen andheron mein yehi Allah Taalaa tumhara rab hai ussi kay liye badshahaat hai uss kay siwa koi mabood nahi phir tum kahan behak rahey ho
